title: Jamal Shah grieved over death of renowned Balochi poet Mubarak Qazi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 17 (APP): Caretaker Federal Minister for National Heritage and Culture, Jamal Shah has expressed his grief and sorrow over the sad demise of the famous Balochi language poet Mubarak Qazi, which occurred late last Friday night.
In a message of condolences on Sunday, the Minister prayed to Allah Almighty to grant eternal peace to the departed soul and to provide strength to the grieving family to bear this irreparable loss with patience and fortitude.
The Minister further emphasized that Mubarak Qazi, through his poetry and literary contributions, will forever be commemorated and cherished.
